column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////They put a lot of care and effort into each cocktail
column2: which is both a good and bad thing in my mind. The good is that you receive a product that is well made
column4: and does justice to the whiskey or spirit that you ordered. The bad is that it sometimes takes forever to get your drink (especially in a large group)
column5: and you pay for it. The drinks are on the higher side of what I would expect here
column6: and 2 cocktails will set you back about $35 (without tax and tip).
